revised_title: Anatomical Analysis and Phylogenetic Affinities of Araucarineae
tldr: The author examines the anatomy and affinities of the Araucarineae, a group of conifers, and concludes that they are closely related to the Cordaitalean forms. The study focuses on the structure of the stem, root, and cone axes, and provides evidence for the connection between Araucarinese and Cordaitalean forms, supporting the Cordaitean ancestry of the Araucarineae.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Biology
